name: HeroMaker - An RPG Character Generator
description:
HeroMaker is a licensed character generator for ICONS, the superpowered roleplaying game.

Whether you're whipping up a quick rogue's gallery for your players or fleshing out an entire world of superpowered characters, HeroMaker is your key to quickly generating new ICONS characters and NPCs. Just tap on the icon at the top to re-generate a new character, complete with attributes and powers and ready for a name. When you find one you like, you can save it with a single tap and start building a roster of heroes and villains for your next ICONS game.

ICONS is a fantastic RPG for people who like fighting crime and battling supervillains. Download HeroMaker now, you'll be saving the day in record time!
